body:
If you want to report a build error for some package, or a bug in core please use the following template as a guideline:

-----

Summary

### Expected Result

libaec compile!

### Actual Result

md5 is wrong so it cannot compile
md5 for libaec 1.0.2 should be: ef388abe8e6d6928e54f41bc63e12de4

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install hdf5 +cxx +fortran +szip

...
```
title: libaec wrong md5sum
